author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...DANGEROUS HURRICANE BERYL EXPECTED TO BRING LIFE-THREATENING WINDS AND STORM SURGE TO JAMAICA LATER TODAY AND THE CAYMAN ISLANDS TONIGHT AND THURSDAY...
summary:
...DANGEROUS HURRICANE BERYL EXPECTED TO BRING LIFE-THREATENING WINDS AND STORM SURGE TO JAMAICA LATER TODAY AND THE CAYMAN ISLANDS TONIGHT AND THURSDAY...
 As of 2:00 AM EDT Wed Jul 3
 the center of Beryl was located near 16.3, -73.5
 with movement WNW at 22 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 946 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 145 mph.

title: Summary - Hurricane Beryl (AT2/AL022024)
